DOC.brief_summary: To monitor post-market performance evaluation short long-term performance via : - Efficacy - Safety - Patient report outcome
DOC.brief_title: Collection Long Term Patient Outcomes Data Following Implantation AMS Surgical Devices
DOC.detailed_description: As post-market registry market approve device , formal hypothesis test . However , point evaluation include : - Characterize efficacy AMS market approve female pelvic health product use standard care outcome measure validate quality life questionnaire - Characterize type , severity , rate adverse event related AMS market approve female pelvic health product - Collect concomitant procedural data relate pelvic floor area
DOC.criteria: Patients must meet follow criterion consider inclusion registry . Have sign Informed Consent Form Have sign HIPAA Authorization Form equivalent Patient Privacy Form require outside US Is female least 18 year age Is schedule receive least one ( 1 ) AMS market approve female pelvic health implantable product . Is able willing participate registry Patients exclude registry one follow criterion meet . Patients contraindicate receive target AMS market approve female pelvic health product per product 's IFU
